trans-unit.source:
Size
Choose the size of the button.
(Default: Normal)

Mobile
Choose the width of your button:
Options:
  • Expanded: From small until no end, the button will take the full width of its container.
  • Expanded only for mobile: It will take the full width of its container but only for the mobile.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the button will have the contents' width.

Tablet
Choose the width of your button:
Options:
  • Expanded from medium and up: For medium, desktop and larger, the button will take the full width of its container. On mobile, the button will have the contents' width.
  • Expanded only for medium: It will take the full width of its container but only for the tablet.
  • Expanded from medium and down: For medium and small, the button will take the full width of its container. On desktop and larger, the button will have the contents' width.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the button will have the contents' width.

Mobile
Choose the width of your button:
Options:
  • Expanded from large and up: For desktop and larger, the button will take the full width of its container. On mobile and tablet, the button will have the contents' width.
  • Expanded only for large: It will take the full width of its container but only for the desktop.
  • Expanded from large and down: For desktop, medium and small, the button will take the full width of its container. On larger than desktop, the button will have the contents' width.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the button will have the contents' width.

Style
Choose the color of the button. The colors have been predefined from the programmer.
(Default: Primary)

Hollow
Choose whether the button has the hollow style or not.

Clear
Choose whether the button has the clear style or not.

Disabled
Choose whether the button is disabled or not.

Position
Positioning will only be activated if the container option is active.
Options:
  • Align center: The button will be aligned to the center.
  • Align center: The button will be aligned to the right.

      • If nothing is chosen, then the button will be aligned to the left.

Container
If you activate this option, then the button will get the grid-container wrapped around it.
